attributes.action: hold a general election by the end of 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When Tony Blair steps down as Prime Minister, the British public will almost certainly have no say as to who is running their country. We voted for Tony Blair, not Gordon Brown, and I for one believe that a change of leader mid-term is totally unfair.

Therefore, we should hold a general election to decide who should be succesor to Tony Blair, including the possibility of Labour losing power to another party.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
